stimulusHtml: A metal pot is filled with room-temperature water and is then set on a stove. The stove is turned on and the surface in contact with the bottom of the pot is quickly heated to a very high temperature. Which of the following depicts a situation that would increase the time it takes for the water to reach its boiling point?
choicesHtml: Increasing the surface area that the pot is in contact with the hot part of the stove
Using a pot that is made from a material with a higher thermal conductivity
Using a pot that has a thicker bottom section
Using water that is already at a temperature much higher than room temperature
